department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The project aims to provide garbage removal and servicing of bulk garbage containers and roll-on garbage containers at DND Gander in Newfoundland and Labrador for a duration of two (2) years, with an option to extend for one (1) year.
description: The main objective of this contract is to provide all labour, material and equipment needed to remove bulk garbage , and service bulk garbage containers and roll-on garbage containers  at 9 Wing Gander in Gander, NL. Contact Details:   Alexandria Dwyer,  alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, (bro} public services and procurement canada department of public works \/public works and government services looking for bulk garbage removal
